Priority 1
Resolved within 4 Hours 

Priority 2
Resolved within 8 Hours

Priority 3
Resolved within 1 Service Day 

Priority 4
Resolved within 3 Service Days

Priority 5
Resolved within 5 Service Days

text.Contract title and description: TPS Administration Services Contract
text.KPI name and description:
SLA 1 (1) Retirement Benefit Payments:
Target is 100% by payable date or if late application, 100% within 10 working days of receiving an application form. Volume actioned or any outstanding failed cases above 45 days
text.Comments:
This SLA has continued to be impacted by the stockpile of ill health retirement cases being worked through and this continues to impact performance in this area. 
This is not a Capita TP generated backlog, it is work that has been generated within the Ill Health casework under contract with another provider, however, impacts on Capita performance because of the link to TPS benefits. 
 A remedial plan is in place and is being actively managed by the contract management team.

text.Contract title and description: Agile Development Services for Funding Systems
text.KPI name and description: Identify and tackle inequality in employment, skills and pay in the contract workforce and Supplier’s own organisation
text.Good target: Method Statement as detailed in Supplier’s response to the Social Value Question at ITT stage is kept to. The supplier can demonstrate that, in line with timelines specified in the Method Statement, that “action is agreed upon. The action could come in the form of a positive action scheme, a pay review, the identification of training, or a change in policy.  The director who conducted the audit is responsible for the actions. All the directors then have a chance to feedback on the process and methods.” The supplier demonstrates, on a quarterly basis, that the Method Statement is being acted upon. By each performance review, the supplier provides a further report on the “Related Practices and Activities” that have transpired since contract start which demonstrate measures are being taken to meet the Tackling Workforce Inequality Key Indicator. Reporting relating to the metrics defined above are delayed by no more than 5 working days.

text.KPI name and description:
Timeliness of output (within 5 days of planned delivery date).
   5 - Delivered within 5 working days of planned delivery date OR within time period agreed if 
   exceptional criteria apply. (last working day of quarter for outputs and 10 working days after last 
   working day of quarter for reports)
   4 - Delivered within 10 days of planned delivery date (and FCDO were informed of expected delay 5 
   working days prior to original delivery date)
   3 – Delivered within 10 days of planned delivery date (and FCDO were not informed within 5 working 
   days prior to original delivery date)
   2 – Delivered within 15 days of planned delivery date. 
   1 - Delivered within 20 days of planned delivery date delivery
text.Good target: Delivered within 5 working days of planned delivery date OR within time period agreed if exceptional criteria apply. (last working day of quarter for outputs and 10 working days after last working day of quarter for reports)

text.Contract title and description: C17CSAE/701712461 - Command Support Air Transport Recapitalisation (CSAT RECAP)
text.KPI name and description: KPI 1 The Contractor shall achieve availability for 1 Aircraft Task Line (ATL) between 0800-2200 GMT UK on weekdays from the date of Initial Operating Capability until Full Operating Capability. The Contractor shall achieve availability for 2 ATLs, one Monday to Sunday including all Bank Holidays except Christmas Day and New Year's day and one Monday to Friday excluding all Bank Holidays.

text.Contract title and description: DIO Strategic Property Advisor (Lot 3).
text.KPI name and description: Commercial and Estates Project Manager (PM) will investigate the invoices against forecasting reports to see where forecasted spend is being achieved or has not be met. Supplier to provide an explanation on those targets that will not be met for the month. 'Invoiced' counts as actual work forecasted and completed.
text.Comments:
Multiple reasons for missing the target. Expected the Project Tracking Tools will help improve ownership and visibility of budgets at the project level.ÿÿ
We must also ensure where invoice submissions are awaiting Purchase Order being approved/issued that this is reflected in the Forecast accurately.

text.Contract title and description: ASIA PACIFIC WORK PACKAGE 1 CONTRACT for Facilities Management and Property Related Services
text.Supplier: Jones Lang LaSalle Property Consultants Pte Ltd
text.KPI name and description:
OP 01
   The Service Provider will provide the services in compliance with Security requirements
   Zero instances of any of the following:
   1. Failure to comply with Security Requirements.
   2. The Authority being issued a notice, adverse finding, penalty or found by a relevant authority to be in breach of Health and Safety and/or Environmental legislation, regulation and/or codes of practice. 
    3. The Service Provider or any Service Provider Party failing to meet Authority requirements in relation to business continuity or disaster recovery in a live or test situation as measured against the agreed Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery Plan.
   4. Loss, theft and/or fraud in relation to Authority monies/property as a result of the Service Providers (including their staff and Contracting Associates) actions or omissions. 
    5. Service Provider acts or omissions resulting in the unavailability of Authority Buildings.

text.Contract title and description: Get into Teaching - Lead Creative and Strategic Agency
text.KPI name and description:
Average client satisfaction score with agency performance across a range of measures
Overall performance: The key indicator threshold here is that no category within the quarterly performance review report  should be measured 5 (five) or lower in two consecutive quarters.
text.Comments: Average client satisfaction score with agency performance across a range of measures
